extendedInfo.description: Minicabster is a FREE price comparison and booking app for licensed minicabs in London, Manchester and Birmingham, with 10,000+ licensed minicabs on board.Get multiple real-time quotes for your journey within seconds by entering your journey details. Choose the quote you wish to accept and book your minicab instantly.Booking a minicab via the Minicabster app is faster and easier than calling the operators directly, which gives you a great selection of competitive quotes direct to your mobile or tablet device.Book an Minicabster journey with 3 simple steps:1)    Enter your journey details to gain multiple real-time quotes2)    Pay securely by card or pay cash to the driver3)    Receive your email confirmation and travel safely with licensed minicabsFeatures of the Minicabster App:Receive multiple real-time quotes from licensed minicab operatorsPre-book your airport transfersPay securely by card or pay cash to the driverView customer ratings of operators before choosing your quoteReceive quotes specific to your requirements (child or booster seat, wheelchair access, executive car)Ability to use GPS to âlocate meâ if pick up address is unknownRemembers your favourite addresses for faster bookingsRe-submit a favourite journey to retrieve quotes without having to enter details againText and email booking confirmations sent to you with contact details for your operator

reviews.title: Saved me money :)
reviews.comment: Saved me \302\24340 on a journey to Heathrow Airport.
reviews.author: Irshad Khan

reviews.title: Cabs turn up 1 in 3 times
reviews.comment: Yet again I\'m having a problem with this app. There is no accountability. Companies agree a fair and can\'t deliver. Too often left waiting calling to see where my taxi is. Deleting the app now.
reviews.author: Andrew Bannerman

reviews.title: Can\'t find address
reviews.comment: After update can not find any address so doesn\'t work!
reviews.author: Tom Amber

reviews.title: MONEY SAVER
reviews.comment: VERY USEFUL APP DECENT CAR AND GOOD PRICE
reviews.author: Brooke Pursey

reviews.title: Doesn\'t let you pay
reviews.comment: Tried to pay by card twice and it crashed both times. I will use ubicabs instead.
reviews.author: Simon Hunter

reviews.title: Update problem
reviews.comment: Since the most recent update I\'ve been unable to enter any address to plan a journey.
reviews.author: Cassandra Conroy

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: I have a samsung galaxy s4 and i can not enter destination. I always get a message that can not find an address and no matted what i enter no address is offered
reviews.author: Massimo Ghislandi

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very good app, gets various quotes for what you need and you can also see what people have reviewed. Reason for 4 stars is that I would like to see more firms with more ratings.
reviews.author: Vaheed Arshad

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: Simply doesn\'t work. Click search, little buffering/thinking icon flashes up, then returns to enter details page.
reviews.author: Richard Miller

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Amazingly useful, saves a lot of money on blackcabs
reviews.author: Stephen Bernasconi

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.comment: Just used this handy app to book a cab. Very user friendly. Cab was great price and turned up early. Even in the snow!
reviews.author: Lawley Exelby

reviews.title: Battery drainer
reviews.comment: Decent idea but my battery life plummeted overnight and usage stats showed it was down to this app trying to use gps in the background. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Shaheel Galaya

reviews.title: Good but could be better
reviews.comment: Nice and intuitive UI. Doesn\'t search for quotes as fast, or from as many companies, as a similar taxi app.
reviews.author: Joe Goodall

reviews.title: Fantastic app!!
reviews.comment: A great way to book cabs! Easy to use, reliable service at a great price. Would highly recommend!
reviews.author: Antonia Naughton

reviews.title: Handy app
reviews.comment: Easy to book & saved me money! Lovely driver that arrived on time too, will use again.
reviews.author: Doreen Cadwell

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Very quick and effective. Don\'t hesitate to trust anycabs!
reviews.author: Mathilde Poirrier

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Very handy app, love it
reviews.author: franki m

reviews.title: Great response from dev
reviews.comment: Had trouble with app, dev was extremely helpful in sorting it out
reviews.author: Anthony Pettit

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Handy app!
reviews.author: Helen Lamb

reviews.title: Superb app
reviews.comment: Simple easy and fabulous app for booking a cab!
reviews.author: Zaahid Khan
